body: This one is great but why the female mc is so fucking dumb?!
Why the fuck are you judging the characters these aren't fucking real
Yeah, All I could say is that the woman is really dumb. You two are in a relationship and still not consult your husband first?

@Gxddz Then random coworker walks up and shows a picture of her cheating with the boss and he asks what they should do about this? Then she just thinks, why? how could this happen? What should I do now? then it ends. So yeah wife got NTR'd cause she didn't trust her husband a single bit, boss did it both to get back at the husband and cause the wife was easy and stupid. Then the ending implies she will turn into a sex slave again for this new random person because she loves her husband and is afraid he'll leave her if he finds out most likely.

@Gxddz in short the boss just lies that the husband has messed up and the company lost money, to make up for it he demands the wife becomes his sex slave. He then goes on to fuck her while saying all of this is the husbands fault which the wife eventually starts to believe and even lashes out at the husband because she hates the situation she's in, but she's also loving the sex when it happens which gives her feelings of guilt afterwards. What really happened was that the boss is corrupt and got caught by the husband who's reported him and he's about to lose his job after when the wife finds this out in the last chapter the boss just laughs at her for not even trusting her husband and trying to verify everything before spreading her legs. Then she pretty much get drugged + gangbanged while confused on if she should feel happy or sad. Then last pages are boss has been fired, she's trying to do everything she can to make up to her husband and will spend the rest of her life to atone.
Anyone know what happened that made her start crying like that? I don’t understand the language

it's necessary for the genre the lack of common sense and abuse the same cliches for the ntr  works.

For example, fmc husband or boyfriend must be an idiot who doesnt realize anything and the fmc must be a brainless one who agrees to any sexual request against his will so that in the end she reaches the same resolution, the rapist or blackmailer fucks better or/and has a bigger dick than her husband/boyfriend, forgetting her initial purpose.

What's more, the antagonist makes no effort to achieve his goal because authors makes sure that all his "evil plans" go well, no matter how stupid they are.

Honestly, finding an NTR without these cliches is like looking for a coke in a desert.

Looks like every FMC in NTR got heavy trust issues with their spouse. Is it really that hard talk to each other problems and solve it without hurting? Geez.

Story aside, the art really exceptional. 9/10.

Lol I like that she coulda just asked her man if he fucked up with the money and it woulda been over, but since she assumed he was a fuck up she assumed that nigga burnt millions on accident and just went with it.
The ending wasn't too convincing - it was hastily concluded so it seemed.
LMAO! what a stupid woman, i am surprised that those three pricks didn't tell her husband about the NTR since he was the one who caught them.
This is so amazing and freaking hot! I'm waiting for translate so much.
